text: Society's playbook for adulthood? More fiction than fact!
Bet most "adult experts" are wingin' it heavy too!
Cat jungle gym...cats don’t even hunt jungles!
In editing too! Had folks second-guess decisions 'til proof's literally published. Showing up quality work consistently opened doors though!

Tough when you spot plot holes wider than O'Connell Street but somehow pointing 'em out means you're "just not getting it". Maybe they'd prefer if we just nodded along? But hey, someone's gotta call out the emperor’s new clothes!
